query:
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.slug, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ph.category) as categories
FROM projects p
LEFT JOIN photos ph ON ph.projectId = p.id
WHERE p.isVisible = 1
GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.slug
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3KMh2yGgHww6rVT.root --database 3s8FCUF9BWUfzRwVV77JBG --execute SELECT p.id, p.title, p.slug, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ph.category) as categories
FROM projects p
LEFT JOIN photos ph ON ph.projectId = p.id
WHERE p.isVisible = 1
GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.slug
LIMIT 10;
